pages.title: Where to find
pages.text: Not every block that an Enderman carries seems to be what is looks like at first glance.

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: Some Endermen appear in the Overworld carrying Blocks that could very well be small relics of the End itself. You can get a hold of one by killing an Endermen while it carries what loks like Cobblestone. Endermen holding these blocks can also be found in the End, albeit more rarely.
